title: 怎么让走过的路变成某个方块
author: 学神
txt_content: 如题 怎么让走过的路变成某个方块

replies.author: もぺもぺ
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 もぺもぺ 于 2020-5-15 17:10 编辑 
学神 发表于 2020-5-15 17:04
版本是 1.15.1
/execute as @a at @s run setblock ~ ~-1 ~ stone

replies.author: one_
replies.txt_content:
https://zhidao.baidu.com/question/2075614918649704188.html/setblock ~ ~1 ~ <方块名称>/setblock ~ ~1 ~ minecraft:glowstone

这一条就是minecraft走过的地方生成方块的指令

replies.author: 学神
replies.txt_content:
もぺもぺ 发表于 2020-5-15 17:02
游戏版本？
版本是 1.15.1

replies.author: 晴路卡
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 晴路卡 于 2020-5-15 17:10 编辑 

高频执行这条命令就可以
execute as @a at @s run setblock ~ ~-1 ~ lava复制代码需要玩家离开才将方块替换掉的话
可以按顺序高频执行这些命令
execute as @a at @s unless block ~ ~-1 ~ minecraft:air positioned ~-0.5 ~-1 ~-0.5 unless entity @e[type=minecraft:area_effect_cloud,tag=air,dx=0,dy=0,dz=0] run summon minecraft:area_effect_cloud ~0.5 ~ ~0.5 {Duration:9999999,Tags:["air"]}
execute as @e[tag=air] at @s positioned ~-0.5 ~1 ~-0.5 unless entity @a[dx=0,dy=0,dz=0] run setblock ~0.5 ~-1 ~0.5 lava destroy
execute as @e[tag=air] at @s positioned ~-0.5 ~1 ~-0.5 unless entity @a[dx=0,dy=0,dz=0] run kill @s复制代码
